name: Hieronymus Bosch Puzzle
description:
The Jigsaw Puzzle and other puzzles contains 216 tiles.
Here you can find 6 games (included Unproportional Puzzle!) and 8 pictures. Autosave. This game is for monitors 1600x1200 or higher. If you have a small monitor - use Ctrl and the mouse wheel to reduce the size of the game.
Play the game for free, solve puzzles, kill your free time and enjoy!
